meanings.sent1: She acted qua the team leader during the project.
meanings.sent2: He spoke qua a representative of the company.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed qua the king of the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone qua a golden crown in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The tree stood tall qua a guardian of the forest.

meanings.sent1: He felt happy qua a child on his birthday.
meanings.sent2: She ran fast qua a cheetah.
meanings.sent3: The clown danced qua a jolly entertainer.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled qua a ghost in the night.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed calmly qua a peaceful stream.

meanings.sent1: She sang qua the lead singer in the band.
meanings.sent2: He worked qua a teacher at the school.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel chattered qua the guardian of the nuts.
meanings.sent4: The moon glowed qua a silent observer in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The flower bloomed qua a colorful artist in the garden.

meanings.definition: In the character or capacity of
meanings.sent1: He spoke qua the wise old man in the story.
meanings.sent2: She acted qua the brave knight in the play.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked qua the protector of the house.
meanings.sent4: The candle flickered qua a guiding light in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood tall qua a majestic ruler of the land.
